name: Square Game Halloween New
description:
Description

This is an improved version of a game I made last year. the multiplayer option currently does not work. I wanted to release this before Halloween so it is incomplete but I will be updating it over time.

Controls
  • WASD - Space to move around and jump
  • 123 - scroll wheel for switching between spells
  • Right-click to teleport
  • Left-click to use a spell
  • E to use your ultimate
  • ESC to pause
